ComicInfo.Summary:
“BOOK OF REVELATIONS,” Part One of Seven
After being attacked by some of his fellow ‘Breed, Ray Stoner realizes he can no longer hide from what he is: a monster. He returns to the mystical city Elsewhere and discovers much has changed. The struggle he is unwillingly part of has become extremely more dangerous and the stakes astronomically higher.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/breed-iii-1-a-return-to-elsewhere/4000-270060/
ComicInfo.Title: The Book of Revelations
